name: Allison of Astra: Margarita Mix (S1 E6)
name_original: Allison of Astra: Margarita Mix (S1 E6)
description:
After the events of the previous game, Allison and Margarita are now lost in the multiverse.

Contains a full Allison Of Astra adventure for your NES, plus the creative stamp program MESS MAKER!

Try before you buy: play the browser version here!
